name: Trinity Force
tooltip:
Trinity Force

Cost: 3333
+10 Ability Haste
+35 Attack Damage
+35% Attack Speed
+200 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Threefold Strike: Basic attacks grant 25 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion also increases base attack damage by 6% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 30% increase.

UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 second cooldown).

UNIQUE Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
